original_text:
Excalibur Unleashed
Excalibur Unleashed, una macchinetta che rende omaggio alla leggenda arturiana attraverso la realizzazione di adorabili animali che troviamo nel bosco, tutti agghindati in stile medievale. Pragmatic Play ha lavorato alla realizzazione di una griglia unica che presenta 5 rulli e una struttura insolita a croce, con 3-4-4-4-3 per riga, con 20 linee di pagamento fisse.
Re Artù, i suoi cavalieri e la spada Excalibur sono la storia più affascinante da raccontare secondo questo provider che ha scelto di usare simboli speciali e funzionalità uniche per offrire una vincita potenziale che arriva fino a 5.000 volte con un RTP al 96,05%.
Grafica della slot Excalibur Unleashed
Graficamente la  slot Excalibur Unleashed è un vero gioiello realizzato dagli sviluppatori del provider: è ambientata in una bellissima foresta, che troviamo sullo sfondo dello schermo e riesce a sorprendere insieme agli animali protagonisti del gameplay. Tra alberi, ruscelli e una classica ambientazione notturna, ci troviamo davanti a una serie di simboli importanti classici come le carte reali, e i personaggi principali che raccontano il tema della slot.
Tra loro ci sono sfere di cristallo, corone, un topino che rappresenta Artù e un gufo vestito da Merlino. Possono offrire da 5 a 25 volte la puntata se completano una linea di pagamento. ma vediamo insieme le sue funzionalità speciali!
Caratteristiche di gioco e funzioni
Se cerchi una slot online che sia piena di funzionalità speciali e bonus game, allora questo gioco non fa al caso tuo. Con Excalibur Unleashed slot puoi divertirti a giocare solo con la funzione Free Spin. Per attivarla devi far atterrare due jolly nello stesso giro e riceverai subito 6 giri gratuiti e la possibilità di tenere jolly fissi sulle caselle in cui si sono posizionati durante tutta la funzione di gioco.
Considerazioni finali
Dopo averla vista da vicino e provata, possiamo dire che la slot Excalibur Unleashed offre una fantastica esperienza di gioco. Ha uno stile di gioco semplice, una bella grafica e pochissime distrazioni. Non capita spesso che un gioco di slot elimini lo Scatter dal proprio gameplay, ma è stato fatto per ripulire al minimo ogni tipo di “superficialità” e ridurre davvero al minimo le funzioni di gioco.
Sicuramente visto anche il potenziale di vincita che offre potrebbe non essere considerata la miglior slot per gli high rollers, soprattutto perché resta una slot con alta volatilità.

Domande Frequenti 
L’RTP della Excalibur Unleashed slot è basso?

No, il ritorno al giocatore è perfettamente nella media di altre slot online.



Posso giocare alla slot Excalibur Unleashed gratis?

Certo, puoi trovare online la versione For fun nei casinò oppure usando la demo che trovi nel nostro sito.



Qual è la vincita massima potenziale di Excalibur Unleashed?

Il potenziale di vincita è pari a 5.000 volte la puntata su qualsiasi giro.

raw_translation.response: Excalibur Unleashed is a slot game that pays homage to the Arthurian legend. The adorable animals found in the forest are all adorned in medieval style. Pragmatic Play has developed a unique grid with 5 reels and an unusual cross structure. The winning potential reaches up to 5,000 times with an RTP of 96.05%. The graphics are a true gem with a beautiful forest background setting, and important symbols of royal cards and main characters who tell the theme of the slot. With only the Free Spin feature, the Excalibur Unleashed slot gives a fantastic gaming experience. The game is simple with few distractions. This high volatility slot may not be the best for high rollers despite its potential large payouts. The RTP is average compared to other online slots. The game can be played for free on casino sites and on our website's demo version. The maximum potential payout is 5,000 times the bet on any given spin. Prepare to enter the enchanted world of Excalibur Unleashed!

raw_translation.response:
Excalibur Unleashed is a slot machine that pays tribute to the Arthurian legend through the creation of adorable animals found in the forest, all dressed in medieval style. Pragmatic Play has worked to create a unique grid that features 5 reels and an unusual cross structure, with 3-4-4-4-3 per row, with 20 fixed paylines.

King Arthur, his knights and Excalibur sword are the most fascinating story to tell according to this provider, who has chosen to use special symbols and unique features to offer a potential win of up to 5,000 times with an RTP of 96.05%.

Graphic of Excalibur Unleashed slot
Graphically, the Excalibur Unleashed slot is a true gem created by the provider's developers: it is set in a beautiful forest, which we find in the background of the screen and manages to amaze along with the animals that are the protagonists of the gameplay. Among trees, streams and a classic nighttime setting, we are faced with a series of important classic symbols such as royal cards, and the main characters that tell the theme of the slot.

Among them are crystal balls, crowns, a mouse representing Arthur and an owl dressed as Merlin. They can offer from 5 to 25 times the bet if they complete a payline. But let's see together its special features!

Gameplay and functions
If you are looking for an online slot that is full of special features and bonus games, then this game is not for you. With the Excalibur Unleashed slot, you can have fun playing only with the Free Spin feature. To activate it, you must land two wilds in the same spin and you will immediately receive 6 free spins and the chance to keep wilds fixed on the boxes where they were positioned throughout the game function.

Final thoughts
After seeing it up close and trying it out, we can say that the Excalibur Unleashed slot offers a fantastic gaming experience. It has a simple gameplay style, beautiful graphics and very few distractions. It's not often that a slot game removes Scatter from its gameplay, but it's been done to minimize any kind of "superficiality" and really reduce the game functions to a minimum.

Surely given the potential winnings it offers, it may not be considered the best slot for high rollers, especially because it remains a high volatility slot.

FAQs
Is the RTP of Excalibur Unleashed slot low?

No, the return to player is perfectly in line with other online slots.

Can I play Excalibur Unleashed slot for free?

Of course, you can find the For Fun version online in casinos or using the demo that you find on our site.

What is the potential maximum win of Excalibur Unleashed?

The potential for winning is up to 5,000 times the bet on any spin.

Pragmatic Play has worked to create a unique grid that features 5 reels and an unusual cross structure, with 3-4-4-4-3 per row, with 20 fixed paylines.

King Arthur, his knights and Excalibur sword are the most fascinating story to tell according to this provider, who has chosen to use special symbols and unique features to offer a potential win of up to 5,000 times with an RTP of 96.05%.

Graphic of Excalibur Unleashed slot
Graphically, the Excalibur Unleashed slot is a true gem created by the provider's developers: it is set in a beautiful forest, which we find in the background of the screen and manages to amaze along with the animals that are the protagonists of the gameplay. Among trees, streams and a classic nighttime setting, we are faced with a series of important classic symbols such as royal cards, and the main characters that tell the theme of the slot.

Among them are crystal balls, crowns, a mouse representing Arthur and an owl dressed as Merlin. They can offer from 5 to 25 times the bet if they complete a payline. But let's see together its special features!

Gameplay and functions
If you are looking for an online slot that is full of special features and bonus games, then this game is not for you. With the Excalibur Unleashed slot, you can have fun playing only with the Free Spin feature. To activate it, you must land two wilds in the same spin and you will immediately receive 6 free spins and the chance to keep wilds fixed on the boxes where they were positioned throughout the game function.

Final thoughts
After seeing it up close and trying it out, we can say that the Excalibur Unleashed slot offers a fantastic gaming experience. It has a simple gameplay style, beautiful graphics and very few distractions. It's not often that a slot game removes Scatter from its gameplay, but it's been done to minimize any kind of "superficiality" and really reduce the game functions to a minimum.

Surely given the potential winnings it offers, it may not be considered the best slot for high rollers, especially because it remains a high volatility slot.

Is the RTP of Excalibur Unleashed slot low?

No, the return to player is perfectly in line with other online slots.

Can I play Excalibur Unleashed slot for free?

Of course, you can find the For Fun version online in casinos or using the demo that you find on our site.

What is the potential maximum win of Excalibur Unleashed?

The potential for winning is up to 5,000 times the bet on any spin.
